verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David יַֽעַנְךָ֣ <WH6030> hear יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> thee in the day צָרָ֑ה <WH6869> of trouble יְ֝שַׂגֶּבְךָ֗ <WH7682> defend שֵׁ֤ם ׀ <WH8034> the name אֱלֹהֵ֬י <WH430> of the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> of Jacob
יִשְׁלַֽח־ <WH7971> Send עֶזְרְךָ֥ <WH5828> thee help מִקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> from the sanctuary וּ֝מִצִּיּ֗וֹן <WH6726> thee out of Zion יִסְעָדֶֽךָּ׃ <WH5582> and strengthen
יִזְכֹּ֥ר <WH2142> Remember כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִנְחֹתֶ֑ךָ <WH4503> all thy offerings וְעוֹלָתְךָ֖ <WH5930> thy burnt sacrifice יְדַשְּׁנֶ֣ה <WH1878> and accept סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah
יִֽתֶּן־ <WH5414> Grant לְךָ֥ כִלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <WH3824> thee according to thine own heart וְֽכָל־ <WH3605> all עֲצָתְךָ֥ <WH6098> all thy counsel יְמַלֵּֽא׃ <WH4390> and fulfil

נְרַנְּנָ֤ה ׀ <WH7442> We will rejoice בִּ֘ישׁ֤וּעָתֶ֗ךָ <WH3444> in thy salvation וּבְשֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> and in the name אֱלֹהֵ֥ינוּ <WH430> of our God נִדְגֹּ֑ל <WH1713> we will set up [our] banners יְמַלֵּ֥א <WH4390> fulfil יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִשְׁאֲלוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4862> all thy petitions

עַתָּ֤ה <WH6258> Now יָדַ֗עְתִּי <WH3045> Now know כִּ֤י <WH3588> for הוֹשִׁ֥יעַ ׀ <WH3467> saveth יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> I that the LORD מְשִׁ֫יח֥וֹ <WH4899> his anointed יַ֭עֲנֵהוּ <WH6030> he will hear מִשְּׁמֵ֣י <WH8064> heaven קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <WH6944> him from his holy בִּ֝גְבֻר֗וֹת <WH1369> strength יֵ֣שַׁע <WH3468> with the saving יְמִינֽוֹ׃ <WH3225> of his right hand

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> Some בָ֭רֶכֶב <WH7393> Some [trust] in chariots וְאֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> and some בַסּוּסִ֑ים <WH5483> and some in horses וַאֲנַ֓חְנוּ ׀ <WH587> we בְּשֵׁם־ <WH8034> the name יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣ינוּ <WH430> our God נַזְכִּֽיר׃ <WH2142> but we will remember
הֵ֭מָּה <WH1992> They כָּרְע֣וּ <WH3766> They are brought down וְנָפָ֑לוּ <WH5307> and fallen וַאֲנַ֥חְנוּ <WH587> we קַּ֝֗מְנוּ <WH6965> but we are risen וַנִּתְעוֹדָֽד׃ <WH5749> and stand upright
יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> LORD הוֹשִׁ֑יעָה <WH3467> Save הַ֝מֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> let the king יַעֲנֵ֥נוּ <WH6030> hear בְיוֹם־ <WH3117> us when קָרְאֵֽנוּ׃ <WH7121> we call
